title: Delete yorick from the game
body:
Have you ever had someone lock in yorick "yorick is OP" and you just want to kill your self.

Hes just there to make you lose.

replies.body:
If I remember correctly, he's not on free rotation because he's considered to be the most toxic champion in the game to lane against.

That should tell you plenty about his lane power, that being said, he's probably the most useless champion in teamfights later on.

In other words, miserable to deal with for both teams.
of course the bronze players say Yorick is good....

I got bullied by a good yorick at top lane playing a fairly decent champion... {{champion:150}} 

let me say.... Ouch.. his minions.. they just kept coming for me.. O_O not even the turret was safe...

Although Yorick surely isn't strong, he's not extremely weak either. If you lock in a Yorick, you've essentially won the lane if your opponent doesn't have sustain. He is a strong lane bully and has great sustain. His only weakness is his mana consumption in lane.
